title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.3 - Adverse action notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.3 - Adverse action notice

State Regulations

Adverse action notice means a notice from a social
services agency advising a recipient of food stamp benefits of its
determination to discontinue, reduce, or suspend such recipient's food stamp
benefits, within the food stamp certification period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
358-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
